ai-ja363:1.4_0: this is how it leads to me.
ai-ja363:2.1_0: For if you do say that
ai-ja363:3.1_0: You’re not diligent by the sound of your friends,
ai-ja363:3.3_0: and the son of the Sakyans,
ai-ja363:3.4_0: by dividing their wealth in four.
ai-ja363:4.3_0: they develop a fruit of fruit,
ai-ja363:5.1_0: Having drunk the nectar of seclusion
ai-ja363:5.3_0: free of stress, free of evil,
ai-ja363:5.4_0: one drinks the joyous nectar of Dhamma.”
